message: Let's start with a fair offer. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.  We have plenty of time to negotiate!
I think a 55/45 split is a fair starting point.  It's a little more equitable than your offer, and we can still negotiate from here.
I'm willing to compromise a bit, but 60/40 is a good starting point. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Let's split it evenly.  It's the fairest solution and we both get a decent amount.  No need to keep negotiating!
